ai-tha-ap26:1.1_0: “The moon shines in the city of Moon,
ai-tha-ap26:1.3_0: Carefully off the faults of others,
ai-tha-ap26:2.2_0: heap up three fires away like fire.
ai-tha-ap26:3.1_0: kind is to be abundant in me.
ai-tha-ap26:3.3_0: Now what if I, having these five precepts,
ai-tha-ap26:4.1_0: of the sages, free of vanity,
ai-tha-ap26:5.1_0: A hundred thousand years in the human realm
ai-tha-ap26:5.2_0: long life is to be found.
ai-tha-ap26:6.1_0: and when the time is right,
ai-tha-ap26:7.1_0: But those who live for the sake of their own mind,
ai-tha-ap26:7.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap26:8.1_0: the (follows) of the gods and men,
ai-tha-ap26:8.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap26:8.3_0: I rejoice in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap26:9.1_0: and five-fold succession and seven months,
ai-tha-ap26:10.1_0: After passing away from the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap26:10.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap26:11.1_0: at the time of the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap26:11.4_0: The training rule on gaining five
ai-tha-ap26:12.1_0: Having heard my virtue together with a thousand men,
ai-tha-ap26:13.4_0: the measureless virtues of good qualities,
ai-tha-ap26:14.3_0: Afterwards these people in the next life
ai-tha-ap26:15.1_0: He swept away the army of fame
ai-tha-ap26:15.3_0: if they weren’t sprinkled on an eon;
ai-tha-ap26:16.4_0: I have gone forth from the household life.
ai-tha-ap26:17.4_0: they are capable of getting what is said.
ai-tha-ap26:18.4_0: What kind of result do you think is:
ai-tha-ap26:19.2_0: mortification for a full very time,
ai-tha-ap26:19.3_0: I am one who lacks virtue,
ai-tha-ap26:20.1_0: Afterwards these people in the next life
ai-tha-ap26:20.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap26:21.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap26:22.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasikha.
ai-tha-ap26:23.1_0: Precepts of the five Theras is the fourth Elder Parinibbāna.
